content: Thank you for sharing your viewpoint. Many people share your perspective that social media companies should take responsibility for the negative impact of their platforms. They have a significant interest in ensuring that their platform is safe, secure and promotes respectful communication. Since social media companies profit from user engagement, they must take proactive measures to ensure that their platform is not causing harm to users. Implementing stricter regulations and solutions to address these issues could help promote positive interaction and reduce the negative impact of social media on individuals' wellbeing.
